Method Summary
static void play(int duration)
          play note at the current pitch for the given duration in milliseconds (the initial pitch is A = 440 Hz)
static void reset()
          reset the pitch to note A = 440 Hz
static void rest(int duration)
          rest for given duration
static void scalePitch(double factor)
          multiply the pitch frequency by the given factor (a factor less than one will lower the pitch)
